Mantlebio SDK
======================================

Overview
--------
Mantle SDK is a comprehensive SDK designed to help 
developers leverage data within Mantle's platform.

For more information on the Mantle platform, visit `Mantle's website <https://www.mantlebio.com/>`_.

For more examples on Mantle SDK, visit `Mantle's documentation <https://docs.mantlebio.com/sdk/>`_.

Getting Started
---------------

Install via pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install mantlebio

For more information see the `Installation <https://docs.mantlebio.com/sdk/installation>`_ page of 
our documentation.
